title: Judith and Joseph Wagner Chair in Women's Health Research Fund
description: To provide salary, research and/or program support for the Chair of the Center for Women's Health Research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  The initial chairholder shall be Judith Regensteiner, PhD.
marketingContent: To provide salary, research and/or program support for the Chair of the Center for Women's Health Research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  The initial chairholder shall be Judith Regensteiner, PhD.
